        public URI getURI()
        Description copied from interface: IResource
        Returns the URI for this resource. Note that there is no requirement that the value returned be the same value that was provided to the IResourceFactory object used to create this instance.
        Specified by:

      • walkTree

        public void walkTree(IResourceVisitor visitor)
              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IResource
        Walks the folder tree rooted at the current resource, calling the IResourceVisitor.visitResource(IResourceVisitor.Resource, String) method for each resource or folder resource encountered.

        If this resource is not a folder, then visitor's IResourceVisitor.visitResource(IResourceVisitor.Resource, String) method is called once for this resource.

        Specified by:
        walkTree in interface IResource
        Parameters:
        visitor - An instance of IResourceVisitor
        Throws:
        IOException

      • asVisitorResource

        public IResourceVisitor.Resource asVisitorResource()
                                            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IResource
        This is a convenience method to return the current resource as a IResourceVisitor.Resource object. This is useful for when you want to invoke a resource visitor for a resource that was obtained by means other than IResource.walkTree(IResourceVisitor). The resource must exist.
        Specified by:
        asVisitorResource in interface IResource
        Returns:
        An IResourceVisitor.Resource for current resource
        Throws:
        IOException - if the resource does not exist

      • isFolder

        public boolean isFolder()
        Specified by:
        isFolder in interface IResourceVisitor.Resource
        Returns:
        True if the resource is a folder

      • resolve

        public IResource resolve(String relative)
        Description copied from interface: IResource
        Returns an IResource for the resource obtained by resolving the URI of this resource with the specified relative URI. Use this method instead of calling URI.resolve(String) on the value returned by IResource.getURI() to ensure that the cached resource for the URI exists as URI.resolve(String) can be unreliable when dealing with bundle resources.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface IResource
        Parameters:
        relative - the path to resolve against
        Returns:
        the resolved path

        Overrides:
